metadata.title: CVE-2024-5564 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
A vulnerability was found in libndp. This flaw allows a local malicioususer to cause a buffer overflow in NetworkManager, triggered by sending amalformed IPv6 router advertisement packet. This issue occurred as libndpwas not correctly validating the route length information.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-5564` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libndp-tools - 1.8-1fakesync1ubuntu0.24.04.1
libndp0 - 1.8-1fakesync1ubuntu0.24.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libndp package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8-1fakesync1ubuntu0.24.04.1').
